any_of.tooltip: Returns true if the first operand is equal to the second operand, else returns false

all_of.name: NOT

any_of.tooltip: Multiplies the right operand with the left operand and assigns the result to the left operand

any_of.name: BY_EQUALS
any_of.tooltip: Divides the left operand with the right operand and assigns the result to the left operand

any_of.name: MOD_EQUALS
any_of.tooltip: Returns true if the first operand is less than or equal to the second operand, else returns false
